tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.20
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayT True isArrayTMIN True isArrayTMAX True isArrayP True isArraySWC False output_data_SNOW $output_data_SNOW output_data_ETP $output_data_ETP output_data_SW_0 $output_data_SW_0 output_data_SW_1 $output_data_SW_1 name SAGA.climate_tools.20 T $T TMIN $TMIN TMAX $TMAX P $P SWC $SWC SWC_DEFAULT $SWC_DEFAULT SWC_SURFACE $SWC_SURFACE SW1_RESIST $SW1_RESIST LAT_DEF $LAT_DEF prefer $prefer response $response outputType_SNOW $OutputSection_SNOW.outputType_SNOW transmissionMode_SNOW $OutputSection_SNOW.transmissionMode_SNOW outputType_ETP $OutputSection_ETP.outputType_ETP transmissionMode_ETP $OutputSection_ETP.transmissionMode_ETP outputType_SW_0 $OutputSection_SW_0.outputType_SW_0 transmissionMode_SW_0 $OutputSection_SW_0.transmissionMode_SW_0 outputType_SW_1 $OutputSection_SW_1.outputType_SW_1 transmissionMode_SW_1 $OutputSection_SW_1.transmissionMode_SW_1

param.name: T
param.label: Mean Temperature
param.help: Mean Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TMIN
param.label: Minimum Temperature
param.help: Minimum Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TMAX
param.label: Maximum Temperature
param.help: Maximum Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: P
param.label: Precipitation
param.help: Precipitation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: SWC
param.label: Soil Water Capacity of Profile
param.help: Total soil water capacity (mm H2O). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: SWC_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_SNOW
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SNOW
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_ETP
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_ETP
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_SW_0
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SW_0
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_SW_1
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SW_1
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool calculates the water balance for the selected position on a daily basis. Needed input is monthly data of mean, minimum, and maximum temperature as well as precipitation.
